title: Seven Gravity Cold Email Sequences
description: 3-email sequences with 3 variants each for A/B testing. 10-15 qualified leads in 60 days offer.

variant_a.subject: 10-15 qualified {niche} leads in 60 days
variant_a.body:
Hey {first_name},

Most {niche} teams struggle to get consistent, qualified pipeline.

We help {niche} companies like {company_name} generate 10-15 qualified leads in 60 days that actually fit your ICP.

We just helped a team triple their pipeline with leads that convert.

Mind if I share a quick video showing how it works?

variant_b.subject: Quick question about {company_name}'s pipeline
variant_b.body:
Hey {first_name},

Are you currently hitting your lead targets for {company_name}?

We specialize in generating 10-15 qualified {niche} leads per month that match your ICP. No time wasters—just prospects ready to convert.

Recent client went from 3 qualified leads/month to 15 in under 60 days.

Can I send a breakdown of how we do it?

variant_c.subject: Saw {company_name} and had an idea
variant_c.body:
Hey {first_name},

Noticed {company_name} is in the {niche} space. Quick question—how's your lead quality right now?

We help {niche} businesses generate 10-15 ICP-fit leads in 60 days. No fluff, just qualified prospects.

Should I send over a video showing our process?

variant_a.subject: Re: 10-15 qualified {niche} leads in 60 days
variant_a.body:
Hey {first_name},

Following up on my last email about generating qualified pipeline for {company_name}.

We recently helped a {niche} company go from 2-3 leads/month to 15 qualified opportunities in 8 weeks. Their close rate doubled because the leads actually fit their ICP.

I recorded a 2-minute video breaking down the exact process.

Mind if I share it?

variant_b.subject: Example for {company_name}
variant_b.body:
Hey {first_name},

Since you didn't reply, I figured I'd add context.

Here's what we typically see: {niche} teams waste time on unqualified leads that go nowhere. We fix that by targeting prospects who match your ICP from day one.

10-15 qualified leads in 60 days, every time.

Want to see examples from companies like yours?

variant_c.subject: Re: Quick question about {company_name}'s pipeline
variant_c.body:
Hey {first_name},

Still curious if you're open to hitting 10-15 qualified leads per month.

We just wrapped a project where a {niche} team went from chasing cold leads to having qualified prospects reach out daily. Revenue jumped 40% in 90 days.

I put together a quick video showing how.

Mind if I send it over?

variant_a.subject: Last attempt - {company_name}
variant_a.body:
Hey {first_name},

I'll keep this short. If you're not interested in 10-15 qualified {niche} leads per month, that's totally fine—just let me know so I stop bothering you.

But if timing's just off, I'm happy to circle back in Q2.

Mind if I share a quick breakdown of how we can achieve this for {company_name}?

variant_b.subject: Should I stop emailing?
variant_b.body:
Hey {first_name},

I've reached out twice about helping {company_name} generate qualified pipeline, but haven't heard back.

If it's a no, just reply 'not interested' and I'll leave you alone.

If it's a maybe, reply 'later' and I'll check back in a few months.

What's your take?

variant_c.subject: Yes or no?
variant_c.body:
Hey {first_name},

Last email. Is getting 10-15 qualified {niche} leads per month something {company_name} needs?

If yes—let's talk.
If no—just say so and I'll stop.

I'd rather hear 'not interested' than keep guessing.

What do you say?

variant_a.subject: Pipeline issue at {company_name}?
variant_a.body:
Hey {first_name},

Most {niche} teams struggle with inconsistent pipeline and unqualified demos.

We help {niche} companies generate 10-15 ICP-fit leads in 60 days. No tire kickers—just prospects who match your buyer profile.

A similar SaaS went from 4 demos/month to 18 qualified opportunities.

Can I share a video showing the process?

variant_b.subject: Quick question
variant_b.body:
Hey {first_name},

How's your lead quality at {company_name}? Getting enough qualified demos?

We specialize in helping {niche} teams generate 10-15 leads per month that actually convert. No time wasters.

Recent client increased SQL velocity by 3x in 60 days.

Mind if I send a breakdown?

variant_c.subject: 10-15 qualified leads for {company_name}
variant_c.body:
Hey {first_name},

Noticed {company_name} is in the {niche} space.

We help SaaS teams generate 10-15 qualified leads per month that fit your ICP. No fluff demos—just prospects ready to buy.

Should I send a quick video showing how?

variant_a.subject: Re: Pipeline issue at {company_name}?
variant_a.body:

Following up on qualified pipeline for {company_name}.

We recently helped a {niche} company go from 3 qualified demos/month to 15 in under 8 weeks. Their win rate jumped because leads actually matched their ICP.

I recorded a 2-minute video breaking down the exact approach.

Mind if I share it?

variant_b.body:
Hey {first_name},

Since you didn't reply, here's context.

Most {niche} teams waste cycles on unqualified demos. We fix that by targeting only ICP-fit prospects from day one.

10-15 qualified leads in 60 days, consistently.

Want to see examples from companies like yours?

variant_c.subject: Re: Quick question
variant_c.body:
Hey {first_name},

Still curious if you're open to 10-15 qualified demos per month.

We just wrapped a project where a {niche} team went from chasing tire kickers to qualified pipeline daily. ARR grew 45% in 90 days.

variant_a.subject: Final email - {company_name}
variant_a.body:
Hey {first_name},

I'll make this quick. If you're not interested in 10-15 qualified {niche} demos per month, no worries—just let me know.

If timing's off, I can circle back later.

Mind if I share a quick breakdown of how we can achieve this for {company_name}?

Hey {first_name},

If it's a no, just say so.
If it's a later, tell me when.

Yes—let's talk.
No—I'll stop.
Maybe—tell me when.
